original_text: While Saul was saying this, the Philistine soldiers were making more and more noise. They were all very confused. So Saul said to the priest, ‘Take your hand out of the ephod. It is time to go!’
korean_text: 사울이 제사장에게 말할 때에 블레셋 사람들의 진영에 소동이 점점 더한지라 사울이 제사장에게 이르되 네 손을 거두라 하고

sentences.original_text: the Philistine soldiers were making more and more noise
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 병사들은 점점 더 많은 소음을 내고 있었다

sentences.original_text: So Saul said to the priest
'Take your hand out of the ephod
